name: Scyther
flavorText: While young, they live together deep in the mountains, training themselves in how to fight with their scythes and move at high speeds.
Attack1Text: Search your deck for up to 2 Scyther and put them onto your Bench. Then, shuffle your deck.
Attack2Text: Flip a coin. If heads, prevent all effects of attacks, including damage, done to this Pokemon during your opponent's next turn.

name: Rowlet
flavorText: This wary Pokemon uses photosynthesis to store up energy during the day, while becoming active at night.

name: Dartrix
flavorText: A bit of a dandy, it spends its free time preening its wings. Its preoccupation with any dirt on its plumage can leave it unable to battle.
Attack1Text: This attack does 20 damage to 1 of your opponent's Pokemon. (Don't apply Weakness and Resistance for Benched Pokemon.)
Attack2Text: Flip a coin. If heads, this attack does 20 more damage.

name: Wimpod
flavorText: This Pokemon is a coward. As it desperately dashes off, the flailing of its many legs leaves a sparkling clean path in its wake.
Ability1Text: During your first turn, this Pokemon has no Retreat Cost.

name: Pheromosa
flavorText: One of the Ultra Beasts. It refuses to touch anything, perhaps because it senses some uncleanness in this world.
Attack2Text: If you have only 1 Prize card remaining, this attack does 90 more damage.

name: Charmander
flavorText: From the time it is born, a flame burns at the tip of its tail. Its life would end if the flame were to go out.
Attack1Text: Your opponent's Active Pokemon is now Burned.

name: Charmeleon
flavorText: When it swings its burning tail, it elevates the air temperature to unbearably high levels.
Ability1Text: When you play this Pokemon from your hand to evolve 1 of your Pokemon during your turn, you may discard the top 5 cards of your deck. If any of those cards are Fire Energy cards, attach them to this Pokemon.
Attack1Text: Discard an Energy from this Pokemon.

name: Alolan Vulpix
flavorText: It exhales air colder than -58 degrees Fahrenheit. Elderly people in Alola call this Pokemon by an older nameâ€”Keokeo.
Attack1Text: Search your deck for up to 2 Pokemon, reveal them, and put them into your hand. Then, shuffle your deck.

name: Wooper
flavorText: When the temperature cools in the evening, they emerge from water to seek food along the shore.

name: Quagsire
flavorText: This carefree Pokemon has an easygoing nature. While swimming, it always bumps into boat hulls.
Ability1Text: As often as you like during your turn (before your attack), you may move a Water Energy from 1 of your Benched Pokemon to your Active Pokemon.
Attack1Text: This attack does 20 more damage times the amount of Water Energy attached to this Pokemon.

name: Froakie
flavorText: It protects its skin by covering its body in delicate bubbles. Beneath its happy-go-lucky air, it keeps a watchful eye on its surroundings.
Ability1Text: If this Pokemon has any Water Energy attached to it, it has no Retreat Cost.

name: Frogadier
flavorText: Its swiftness is unparalleled. It can scale a tower of more than 2,000 feet in a minute's time.
Ability1Text: When you play this Pokemon from your hand to evolve 1 of your Pokemon during your turn, you may put 2 damage counters on 1 of your opponent's Pokemon.

name: Voltorb
flavorText: Usually found in power plants. Easily mistaken for a Poke Ball, it has zapped many people.
Ability1Text: If this Pokemon has any Energy attached to it, it has no Retreat Cost.
Attack1Text: Flip a coin. If heads, your opponent's Active Pokemon is now Paralyzed.

name: Xurkitree
flavorText: It appeared from the Ultra Wormhole. It raided a power plant, so people think it energizes itself with electricity.
Attack1Text: Your opponent's Active Pokemon is now Confused.
Attack2Text: If you have exactly 3 Prize cards remaining, your opponent's Active Pokemon is now Paralyzed.

name: Seviper
flavorText: In battle, it uses its bladed tail to counter any Zangoose. It secretes a deadly venom in its tail.
Ability1Text: Put 1 more damage counter on your opponent's Poisoned Pokemon between turns.
Attack1Text: Your opponent's Active Pokemon is now Poisoned.

name: Shuppet
flavorText: It loves vengeful emotions and hangs in rows under the eaves of houses where vengeful people live.

name: Inkay
flavorText: It flashes the light-emitting spots on its body, which drains its opponent's will to fight. It takes the opportunity to scuttle away and hide.
Attack1Text: Your opponent's Active Pokemon is now Asleep.

name: Malamar
flavorText: It lures prey close with hypnotic motions, then wraps its tentacles around it before finishing it off with digestive fluids.
Ability1Text: Once during your turn (before your attack), you may attach a Psychic Energy card from your discard pile to 1 of your Benched Pokemon.

name: Poipole
flavorText: This Ultra Beast is well enough liked to be chosen as a first partner in its own world.
Attack1Text: Your opponent's Active Pokemon is now Poisoned.
Attack2Text: During your opponent's next turn, if this Pokemon is Knocked Out, your opponent can't take any Prize cards for it.

name: Sudowoodo
flavorText: To avoid attack, it mimics a tree. It will run off if splashed with water, which it hates.
Ability1Text: Your opponent can't have more than 4 Benched Pokemon. If they have 5 or more Benched Pokemon, they discard Benched Pokemon until they have 4 Pokemon on the Bench. If more than one effect changes the number of Benched Pokemon allowed, use the smaller number.

name: Riolu
flavorText: It's tough enough to run right through the night, and it's also a hard worker, but it's still just a youngster.
Attack1Text: Flip a coin. If heads, prevent all effects of attacks, including damage, done to this Pokemon during your opponent's next turn.

name: Lucario
flavorText: They can detect the species of a living beingâ€”and its emotionsâ€”from over half a mile away. They control auras and hunt their prey in packs.
Ability1Text: Once during your turn (before your attack), if you have Garchomp in play, you may search your deck for a card and put it into your hand. Then, shuffle your deck.
Attack1Text: This attack's damage isn't affected by Resistance.

name: Rockruff
flavorText: This Pokemon has lived with people since times long ago. It can sense when its Trainer is in the dumps and will stick close by its Trainer's side.
Attack1Text: Flip a coin. If tails, this attack does nothing.

name: Buzzwole
flavorText: A mysterious life-form called an Ultra Beast. Witnesses saw it pulverize a dump truck with a single punch.
Attack1Text: If your opponent has exactly 4 Prize cards remaining, this attack does 90 more damage.
Attack2Text: Flip 2 coins. This attack does 20 more damage for each heads.

name: Zorua
flavorText: It changes so it looks like its foe, tricks it, and then uses that opportunity to flee.

name: Guzzlord
flavorText: A dangerous Ultra Beast, it appears to be eating constantly, but for some reason its droppings have never been found.
Attack1Text: If you have exactly 2, 4, or 6 Prize cards remaining, discard the top 10 cards of your deck.

name: Magnemite
flavorText: It sends out electromagnetic waves, which let it float through the air. Touching it while it's eating electricity will give you a full-body shock.
Attack1Text: Search your deck for up to 3 Metal Energy cards, reveal them, and put them into your hand. Then, shuffle your deck.

name: Magneton
flavorText: It has about three times the electrical power of Magnemite. For some reason, outbreaks of this Pokemon happen when lots of sunspots appear.
Attack2Text: This Pokemon can't use Zap Cannon during your next turn.

name: Magnezone
flavorText: As it zooms through the sky, this Pokemon seems to be receiving signals of unknown origin, while transmitting signals of unknown purpose.
Ability1Text: As often as you like during your turn (before your attack), you may attach a Metal Energy card from your hand to 1 of your Pokemon.
Attack1Text: This Pokemon can't use Zap Cannon during your next turn.

name: Beldum
flavorText: Its cells are all magnets. It uses magnetism to communicate with others of its kind.
Attack1Text: Discard a Metal Energy from this Pokemon.

name: Metang
flavorText: When two Beldum link together, their psychic power is doubled. Their intelligence, however, remains unchanged.
Attack2Text: Discard a Metal Energy from this Pokemon.

name: Celesteela
flavorText: One kind of Ultra Beast. Witnesses have seen it burn down a forest by expelling gas from its two arms.
Attack1Text: If the total of both players' remaining Prize cards is exactly 6, this attack can be used for Metal.

name: Kartana
flavorText: One of the Ultra Beast life-forms, it was observed cutting down a gigantic steel tower with one stroke of its blade.
Attack1Text: If your opponent has exactly 6 Prize cards remaining, this attack does 90 more damage.

name: Ralts
flavorText: If its horns capture the warm feelings of people or Pokemon, its body warms up slightly.
Attack1Text: Heal 10 damage from this Pokemon.

name: Kirlia
flavorText: The cheerful spirit of its Trainer gives it energy for its psychokinetic power. It spins and dances when happy.

name: Diancie
flavorText: A sudden transformation of Carbink, its pink, glimmering body is said to be the loveliest sight in the whole world.
Attack1Text: Search your deck for a card that evolves from 1 of your Pokemon and put it onto that Pokemon to evolve it. Then, shuffle your deck.
Attack2Text: Heal 30 damage from each of your Fairy Pokemon.

name: Altaria
flavorText: On sunny days, it flies freely through the sky and blends into the clouds. It sings in a beautiful soprano.
Ability1Text: Your Dragon Pokemon's attacks do 20 more damage to your opponent's Active Pokemon (before applying Weakness and Resistance).

name: Gible
flavorText: It skulks in caves, and when prey or an enemy passes by, it leaps out and chomps them. The force of its attack sometimes chips its teeth.
Attack1Text: Search your deck for a card that evolves from this Pokemon and put it onto this Pokemon to evolve it. Then, shuffle your deck.

name: Gabite
flavorText: Shiny objects are its passion. It can be found in its cave, scarcely moving, its gaze fixed on the jewels it's amassed or Carbink it has caught.
Attack1Text: Search your deck for a card that evolves from this Pokemon and put it onto this Pokemon to evolve it. Then, shuffle your deck.

name: Garchomp
flavorText: The protuberances on its head serve as sensors. It can even detect distant prey.
Attack1Text: This attack does 50 damage to 1 of your opponent's Pokemon. (Don't apply Weakness and Resistance for Benched Pokemon.)
Attack2Text: If you played Cynthia from your hand during this turn, this attack does 100 more damage.

name: Eevee
evolvesTo: Vaporeon, Jolteon, Flareon, Sylveon, Espeon, Umbreon, Leafeon, Glaceon
flavorText: Current studies show it can evolve into an incredible eight different species of Pokemon.
Ability1Text: When you attach a basic Energy card from your hand to this Pokemon during your turn, you may search your deck for a card that evolves from this Pokemon that is the same type as that Energy card and put it onto this Pokemon to evolve it. Then, shuffle your deck.
Attack1Text: Flip a coin. If heads, draw a card.

name: Swablu
flavorText: It constantly grooms its cotton-like wings. It takes a shower to clean itself if it becomes dirty.
Attack1Text: Draw a card.

name: Noibat
flavorText: They live in pitch black caves. Their enormous ears can emit ultrasonic waves of 200,000 hertz.
Attack1Text: Flip a coin. If heads, prevent all effects of attacks, including damage, done to this Pokemon during your opponent's next turn.

name: Oranguru
flavorText: Deep in the jungle, high in the lofty canopy, this Pokemon abides. On rare occasions, it shows up at the beach to match wits with Slowking.
Ability1Text: Once during your turn (before your attack), you may draw cards until you have 3 cards in your hand.
Attack1Text: This attack does 20 more damage times the amount of Energy attached to your opponent's Active Pokemon.

name: Type: Null
flavorText: The heavy control mask it wears suppresses its intrinsic capabilities. This Pokemon has some hidden special power.
Attack1Text: During your opponent's next turn, this Pokemon takes 30 less damage from attacks (after applying Weakness and Resistance).

name: Leafeon-GX
Ability1Text: If this Pokemon is your Active Pokemon, once during your turn (before your attack), you may heal 50 damage from 1 of your Pokemon that has any Energy attached to it.
Attack2Text: For each of your Benched Basic Pokemon, search your deck for a card that evolves from that Pokemon and put it onto that Pokemon to evolve it. Then, shuffle your deck. (You can't use more than 1 GX attack in a game.)

name: Decidueye-GX
Ability1Text: Once during your turn (before your attack), you may put 2 damage counters on 1 of your opponent's Pokemon.
Attack2Text: Put 3 cards from your discard pile into your hand. (You can't use more than 1 GX attack in a game.)

name: Golisopod-GX
Attack1Text: If this Pokemon was on the Bench and became your Active Pokemon this turn, this attack does 90 more damage.
Attack2Text: During your opponent's next turn, this Pokemon takes 20 less damage from attacks (after applying Weakness and Resistance).

name: Charizard-GX
Attack2Text: Discard 3 Fire Energy from this Pokemon.

name: Ho-Oh-GX
Attack1Text: This attack does 50 damage to 1 of your opponent's Pokemon. (Don't apply Weakness and Resistance for Benched Pokemon.)
Attack2Text: This Pokemon can't use Phoenix Burn during your next turn.

name: Reshiram-GX
Attack1Text: Search your deck for up to 2 Fire Energy cards and attach them to this Pokemon. Then, shuffle your deck.
Attack2Text: Your opponent's Active Pokemon is now Burned.

name: Turtonator-GX
Attack1Text: During your opponent's next turn, if this Pokemon is damaged by an attack (even if this Pokemon is Knocked Out), put 8 damage counters on the Attacking Pokemon.
Attack2Text: Discard 2 Fire Energy from this Pokemon.

name: Alolan Ninetales-GX
Attack1Text: This attack does 50 damage to 1 of your opponent's Pokemon. (Don't apply Weakness and Resistance for Benched Pokemon.)
Attack2Text: Discard 2 Energy from this Pokemon.

name: Articuno-GX
Ability1Text: When you play this Pokemon from your hand onto your Bench during your turn, you may switch it with your Active Pokemon. If you do, move any number of Water Energy from your other Pokemon to this Pokemon.
Attack2Text: Discard all Energy from both Active Pokemon. (You can't use more than 1 GX attack in a game.)

name: Glaceon-GX
Ability1Text: As long as this Pokemon is your Active Pokemon, your opponent's Pokemon-GX and Pokemon-EX in play, in their hand, and in their discard pile have no Abilities, except for Freezing Gaze.
Attack1Text: This attack does 30 damage to 1 of your opponent's Benched Pokemon. (Don't apply Weakness and Resistance for Benched Pokemon.)
Attack2Text: This attack does 50 damage for each damage counter on your opponent's Active Pokemon. (You can't use more than 1 GX attack in a game.)

name: Greninja-GX
Ability1Text: When you play this Pokemon from your hand to evolve 1 of your Pokemon during your turn, you may put 3 damage counters on 1 of your opponent's Pokemon.
Attack1Text: You may shuffle this Pokemon and all cards attached to it into your deck.
Attack2Text: This attack does 130 damage to 1 of your opponent's Benched Pokemon. (Don't apply Weakness and Resistance for Benched Pokemon.) (You can't use more than 1 GX attack in a game.)

name: Electrode-GX
Ability1Text: Once during your turn (before your attack), you may attach 5 Energy cards from your discard pile to your Pokemon, except Pokemon-GX or Pokemon-EX, in any way you like. If you do, this Pokemon is Knocked Out.
Attack2Text: Discard any amount of Energy from your Pokemon. This attack does 50 more damage for each card you discarded in this way. (You can't use more than 1 GX attack in a game.)

name: Xurkitree-GX
Ability1Text: Prevent all damage done to this Pokemon by attacks from your opponent's Pokemon that have any Special Energy attached to them.
Attack1Text: Discard the top card of your opponent's deck.
Attack2Text: Your opponent reveals their hand. Add a card you find there to their Prize cards face down. (You can't use more than 1 GX attack in a game.)

name: Mewtwo-GX
Attack1Text: This attack does 30 damage times the amount of Energy attached to this Pokemon.
Attack2Text: Heal 30 damage from this Pokemon.

name: Espeon-GX
Attack1Text: Your opponent's Active Pokemon is now Confused.
Attack2Text: This attack does 30 more damage times the number of Energy attached to your opponent's Active Pokemon.

name: Banette-GX
Ability1Text: Once during your turn (before your attack), if this Pokemon is your Active Pokemon, you may move 1 damage counter from 1 Pokemon to another Pokemon.
Attack1Text: This attack does 10 more damage for each Supporter card in your discard pile. You can't add more than 100 damage in this way.
Attack2Text: Put 3 cards from your discard pile into your hand. (You can't use more than 1 GX attack in a game.)

name: Nihilego-GX
Ability1Text: When you play this Pokemon from your hand onto your Bench during your turn, you may leave both Active Pokemon Confused and Poisoned.
Attack1Text: The Defending Pokemon can't retreat during your opponent's next turn.
Attack2Text: Add the top 2 cards of your opponent's deck to their Prize cards. (You can't use more than 1 GX attack in a game.)

name: Naganadel-GX
Attack1Text: This attack does 20 damage for each of your Ultra Beasts in play.
Attack2Text: This attack's damage isn't affected by Weakness or Resistance.

name: Lucario-GX
Attack1Text: If this Pokemon evolved from Riolu during this turn, this attack does 90 more damage.

name: Zygarde-GX
Attack1Text: Attach 2 Fighting Energy cards from your discard pile to this Pokemon.

name: Lycanroc-GX
Ability1Text: When you play this Pokemon from your hand to evolve 1 of your Pokemon during your turn, you may switch 1 of your opponent's Benched Pokemon with their Active Pokemon.
Attack2Text: This attack does 50 damage for each of your opponent's Benched Pokemon. (You can't use more than 1 GX attack in a game.)

name: Lycanroc-GX
Ability1Text: When you play this Pokemon from your hand to evolve 1 of your Pokemon during your turn, you may discard an Energy attached to your opponent's Active Pokemon.
Attack2Text: This attack does 30 damage for each Energy card in your opponent's discard pile. (You can't use more than 1 GX attack in a game.)

name: Buzzwole-GX
Attack1Text: This attack does 30 damage to 1 of your opponent's Benched Pokemon. (Don't apply Weakness and Resistance for Benched Pokemon.)
Attack2Text: This Pokemon can't attack during your next turn.

name: Umbreon-GX
Attack1Text: You may switch this Pokemon with 1 of your Benched Pokemon.
Attack2Text: This attack does 30 damage to 1 of your opponent's Benched Pokemon. (Don't apply Weakness and Resistance for Benched Pokemon.)

name: Darkrai-GX
Ability1Text: Once during your turn (before your attack), if this Pokemon is in your discard pile, you may put it onto your Bench. Then, attach a Darkness Energy card from your discard pile to this Pokemon.
Attack1Text: This attack's damage isn't affected by Resistance.
Attack2Text: If your opponent's Active Pokemon is affected by a Special Condition, that Pokemon is Knocked Out. (You can't use more than 1 GX attack in a game.)

name: Guzzlord-GX
Attack1Text: Discard the top 5 cards of your deck. If any of those cards are Energy cards, attach them to this Pokemon.

name: Scizor-GX
Ability1Text: If this Pokemon's remaining HP is 100 or less, its attacks do 80 more damage to your opponent's Active Pokemon (before applying Weakness and Resistance).
Attack1Text: During your opponent's next turn, this Pokemon takes 30 less damage from attacks (after applying Weakness and Resistance).
Attack2Text: If your opponent's Active Pokemon is an Evolution Pokemon, this attack does 100 more damage. (You can't use more than 1 GX attack in a game.)

name: Kartana-GX
Ability1Text: When you play this Pokemon from your hand onto your Bench during your turn, you may discard a Special Energy from 1 of your opponent's Pokemon.
Attack1Text: You may shuffle this Pokemon and all cards attached to it into your deck.
Attack2Text: Take a Prize card. (You can't use more than 1 GX attack in a game.)

name: Stakataka-GX
Ability1Text: Your Ultra Beasts take 10 less damage from your opponent's attacks (after applying Weakness and Resistance).
Attack2Text: This attack does 50 more damage for each Prize card you have taken. (You can't use more than 1 GX attack in a game.)

name: Gardevoir-GX
Ability1Text: Once during your turn (before your attack), you may attach a Fairy Energy card from your hand to 1 of your Pokemon.
Attack1Text: This attack does 30 damage times the amount of Energy attached to both Active Pokemon.
Attack2Text: Shuffle 10 cards from your discard pile into your deck. (You can't use more than 1 GX attack in a game.)

name: Sylveon-GX
Attack1Text: Search your deck for up to 3 cards and put them into your hand. Then, shuffle your deck.

name: Altaria-GX
Attack1Text: During your opponent's next turn, prevent all damage done to this Pokemon by attacks from Pokemon-GX and Pokemon-EX.
Attack2Text: This attack's damage isn't affected by any effects on your opponent's Active Pokemon.

name: Noivern-GX
Attack1Text: Your opponent can't play any Item cards from their hand during their next turn.
Attack2Text: Your opponent can't play any Special Energy cards from their hand during their next turn.

name: Silvally-GX
Ability1Text: Your Basic Pokemon in play have no Retreat Cost.
Attack1Text: Attach a basic Energy card from your discard pile to 1 of your Benched Pokemon.
Attack2Text: This attack does 50 damage for each of your opponent's Benched Pokemon. (You can't use more than 1 GX attack in a game.)

name: Drampa-GX
Attack1Text: Discard a Special Energy from your opponent's Active Pokemon.
Attack2Text: If your Benched Pokemon have any damage counters on them, this attack does 70 more damage.

name: Tapu Bulu-GX
Attack2Text: You may discard all Energy from this Pokemon. If you do, this attack does 60 more damage.

name: Tapu Fini-GX
Attack1Text: You may switch this Pokemon with 1 of your Benched Pokemon.
Attack2Text: Discard 2 Water Energy from this Pokemon. This attack does 120 damage to 1 of your opponent's Pokemon. (Don't apply Weakness or Resistance for Benched Pokemon.)

name: Tapu Koko-GX
Ability1Text: When you play this Pokemon from your hand onto your Bench during your turn, you may move any number of Lightning Energy from your other Pokemon to this Pokemon. If you do, switch this Pokemon with your Active Pokemon.
Attack2Text: This attack does 50 damage times the amount of Energy attached to all of your opponent's Pokemon. (You can't use more than 1 GX attack in a game.)

name: Tapu Lele-GX
Ability1Text: When you play this Pokemon from your hand onto your Bench during your turn, you may search your deck for a Supporter card, reveal it, and put it into your hand. Then, shuffle your deck.
Attack1Text: This attack does 20 damage times the amount of Energy attached to both Active Pokemon. This damage isn't affected by Weakness or Resistance.
Attack2Text: Heal all damage from 2 of your Benched Pokemon. (You can't use more than 1 GX attack in a game.)
